凖字的基本解释

凖
zhǔn
见“准”③凖⑦。

凖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǔn］
［《廣韻》之尹切，上準，章。］
亦作“凖1”。“綧1”的今字。
(1)水之平。
(2)指其它物体的平。
(3)古代测量水平的仪器。
(4)标准；准则。
(5)指使合乎标准。
(6)确定的主意、方式、规律等。
(7)符合；等齐；相当。
(8)衡量，比较。
(9)引申为揣度。
(10)瞄准；测定。
(11)见“準的”。
(12)依照；以为准绳。
(13)仿照；效法。
(14)抵偿；折兑。
(15)谓程度相近，可以看作一类。
(16)准确。
(17)准许；允许。
(18)一定；肯定。
(19)准人。古代狱官。
(20)鼻子。
(21)据以校定乐律（音高）的古乐器名。

凖字的康熙字典解释

凖字的起名意思

暂无。

凖
Basic explanation of words
凖
zhǔn
See "quasi" ③凖⑦.
凖
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhǔn］
[Yin cut in "Guang Yun", first quasi, chapter. ]
Also known as "凖1". The present character of "綧1".
(1) Water level.
(2) Refers to the level of other objects.
(3) An ancient instrument for measuring level.
(4) Standards; Guidelines.
(5) Instruct to comply with the standard.
(6) Determined ideas, methods, rules, etc.
(7) In line with; equal to; equivalent.
(8) Measure and compare.
(9) The extension is guessing.
(10) Aiming; measuring.
(11) See "quasi".
(12) According to; be the criterion.
(13) imitate; imitate.
(14) Compensation; discount.
(15) It is said that the degree is similar, which can be regarded as one kind.
(16) Accurate.
(17) Permit; allow.
(18) Certainly; definitely.
(19) Quasi-person. Ancient prison officer.
(20) Nose.
(21) The name of the ancient musical instrument based on which the rhythm (pitch) is adjusted.
